div.p: The spectra in this collection represent commonly encountered field nuclides, for a variety of handheld detectors.

The spectra were all simulated using GADRAS v19, from inject definitions created by Michael Enhauser (org 06634) of Sandia National Laboratories. There are 223 inject source definitions, each simulated with a live time of 1800 seconds, and with a nominal background in Livermore California.
